CustomField.description:
Draft, Open, or Closed.
Draft: Solicitation creation and configuration stage. Nothing is exposed to the public. Open: Solicitation is open to the public and visible on the Current Funding Opportunities website. Closed: Solicitation is closed and nDraft, Open, or Closed. Draft: Solicitation creation and configuration stage. Nothing is exposed to the public. Open: Solicitation is open to the public and visible on the website. Closed: Solicitation is closed and not visible on the website.ot visible on the Current Funding Opportunities website.Solicitations Status is set to "Closed" automatically exactly at 5 pm on the day of the latest round due date. A change mod is needed to set it back to open.
Canceled status SF-30800
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Draft: Creation and config stage. Nothing is shown to the public. Open: Open to the public and visible on website. Closed: Closed and not visible on the website.Closed automatically at 3pm on the day of the latest round due date. Change mod to re-open
CustomField.label: Status
